title: Jordan Peterson - Jonathan Pageau Dialog Commentary #2 - MoQ Levels Lens
description:
#jordanbpeterson #jonathanpageau #MoQ #Pirsig #Episcopal

I'm going to begin with a little overview of MOQ levels so it's not too confusing, 6 more clips that resonated, plus more about Church.
